pkgmetadata.longdescription: Weighting and Weighted Statistics // This package currently provides a variety of functions for producing simple weighted statistics, such as weighted Pearson's correlations, partial correlations, Chi-Squareds, histograms, and t-tests. Also now includes some software for quickly recoding survey data. Future versions of the package will be more closely integrated with anesrake and additional weighting tools and will provide the option to find weighting benchmarks and weight data using a variety of methodologies. NOTE: Weighted partial correlation calculations temporarily pulled to address a bug.
